item.title: New Pelican website
item.description: Hello there. I present you my new blog / personal website! This is something I've been wanting to do for a very long time, since the old blog hosted at https://grodola.blogspot.com/ was... well, too old. =) This new site is based on Pelican, a static website generator similar to â€¦
